sections.label: Intro 1
content: F5 G5 Ab5 Bb5
Dum, dum Dum Honey what have you done?
Eb5 F5
Dum, Dum, dum It's the sound of my gun
F5 G5 Ab5 Bb5
Dum dum dum honey what have you done
Eb5 Eb5
Dum dum dum it's the sound it's the sound
F G Bb F G Csus4
Nah, nah, nah, Nah, nah, nah,
F G Bb C Csus4
Nah, nah, nah.....

sections.label: Verse 1
content: F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Janie's got a gun, Janies got a gun
F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Her whole world's come undone, from looking straight at the sun
F Bb C F Bb C
What did her daddy do? What did he put you through?

sections.label: Chorus 1
content: Dm(add9)
They said when Janie was arrested,
Bb(add#11) F. F5. Eb5/F. Ab5/F. Eb5/F. F5
They found him underneath a train,
Dm(add9) Bb(add#11)
But man he had it coming, now that Janie's got a gun
Gm7 C F/C C7..
She ain't never gonna be the same

sections.label: Verse 2
content: F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Janie's got a gun. Janie's got a gun
F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Her dog day's just begun, Now everybody is on the run
F Bb C F Bb C
Tell me now it's untrue, What did her daddy do?
Dm(add9)
He jacked a little bitty baby
Bb(add#11) F. F5. Eb5/F. Ab5/F. Eb5/F. F5
The man has got to be insane
Dm(add9) Bb(add#11)
They say the spell that he was under, The lightning and the thunder
Gm7 C F/C C7
Knew that someone had to stop the rain

sections.label: Bridge 1
content: Db Eb Fm7
Run away, Run away from the pain, Yeah, yeah, Yeah, yeah
Db Eb Fm7 Eb5/F Fm7
Run away, Run away from the pain, Yeah, yeah, Yeah Yeahyeah Yeah, yeah
Db Eb Bbm Csus4
Run away, run away, run,run away

sections.label: Verse 3
content: F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Janie's got a gun, Janie's got a gun
F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Her dog day's just begun, Now everybody's on the run
F Bb C F Bb C
What did her daddy do? It's Janie's last I.O.U
Dm(add9)
She had to take him down easy
Bb(add#11) F. F5. Eb5/F. Ab5/F. Eb5/F. F5
And put a bullet in his brain
Dm(add9) Bb(add#11)
She said cos nobody believes me, The man was such a sleaze
Gm7 C F/C C7
He aint never gonna be the same

sections.label: Bridge 2
content: Db Eb Fm7
Run away, Run away from the pain, Yeah, yeah, Yeah, yeah
Db Eb Fm7 Eb5/F Fm7
Run away, Run away from the pain, Yeah, yeah, Yeah Yeahyeah Yeah, yeah
Db Eb Bbm Csus4
Run away, run away, run,run away

sections.label: Outro 1
content: F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Janie's got a gun, Janie's got a gun
F Gm7 Csus4 F Gm7 Csus4
Janie's got a gun, everybody's on the run
